thread.title: Beanpot semifinals tickets 2025: Cheapest prices, seats, date for men's hockey games at TD Garden - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Beanpot semifinals tickets 2025: Cheapest prices, seats, date for men's hockey games at TD Garden - NewsBreak

author: Sloan Piva
title: Beanpot semifinals tickets 2025: Cheapest prices, seats, date for men's hockey games at TD Garden - NewsBreak
text:
By Sloan Piva ,
20 minutes ago
Hockey fans in New England, rejoice â€” the Beanpot returns to Boston's TD Garden in 2025, and many have already started to prepare for the semifinal round.
Held annually for over 70 years, the two-round tournament features the four major college hockey programs in Boston. But the Beanpot is about more than just competitive sport. It's a source of Boston pride, and the winner each winter earns a full year of bragging rights.
The four yearly Beanpot competitors are the Boston University Terriers, Boston College Eagles, Harvard University Crimson, and Northeastern University Huskies (current champions).
Buy now: Tickets to 2025 Beanpot semifinals on StubHub
The semifinals and championship have been played at TD Garden since 1996, except for 2021 when it was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The success of the Beanpot has led many other sports to host their own versions, but there can be only one true Beanpot.
Will Northeastern defend its championship and take down another trophy in 2025? Or, will BU, BC or Harvard get the last laugh this time around?
If you're interested in attending the Beanpot in person this February, here's everything you need to know about purchasing tickets to the semifinals.
Beanpot tickets for 2025 semifinals Tickets: StubHub Tickets to the 2025 Beanpot semifinals are available on StubHub . The website lists this as a "high demand" event, meaning tickets have been selling fast.
As of late January, the most affordable seats for the semis sit in the range of $75-$90 each. You can get pretty close to the TD Garden ice if you're willing to pay $90-$120, and club suites will run you between $183 and $350.
Tickets grant access to both semifinal games, so Beanpot attendees can get more hockey for the price of one.
BUY NOW: Tickets to the 2025 Beanpot semifinals and championship
Beanpot 2025 schedule, start times Round Date Matchup Time (ET) Tickets Semifinals Mon, Feb. 3 Northeastern vs. BC 5:00 p.m. Buy now Semifinals Mon, Feb. 3 Harvard vs. BU 7:00 p.m. Buy now Championship Mon, Feb. 10 TBD vs TBD 4:30 p.m. Buy now The Beanpot semifinals will take place on Monday, Feb. 3. The puck drop for Northeastern vs. Boston College will be 5:00 p.m. ET.
Once that game concludes, Harvard vs. Boston University will follow (likely around 7:00 p.m. ET). You can purchase tickets to the semifinals round here .
The two winners of the semifinal round will face off in the Championship, which will be held on Monday, Feb. 10 at 4:30 p.m. You can also purchase tickets to the title game on StubHub .
